sentences.sentence: He'll go loopy when he hears!
Anita: You are loopy now because you've skipped too, too many classes.
sentences.translation: 你现在可真是迷糊，因为你又逃了那么多课程。

sentences.sentence: "But before he went loopy he was the life and soul of the party, " said Fred.
sentences.translation: 但他在发疯前，可是每次聚会的生命和灵魂哪。
